pyPRISM.potential.Potential module¶

class pyPRISM.potential.Potential.Potential[source]¶

Bases: object

Baseclass for all intermolecular-pairwise potentials

Warning

Currently, this class doesn’t do anything besides group all of the potentials under a single inheritance heirarchy. This will likely change as needs arise.

All potentials should inherit from Potential and these subclasses should all implement a calculate method. All potential parameters should be specified in the constructor except for real-space gridpoints to evaluate the potential at. This information will be provided via Domain object specified in the System.
